video.title: Twisted
video.synopsis: After serving five years for killing his aunt, charming teen Danny Desai returns home to enroll in high school and reconnect with old friends.

episodes.synopsis: A 16-year-old with a troubled past becomes the prime suspect in a murder when a fellow student is found dead in her home.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: When Danny and his mother host a dinner for Jo and her parents, Jo's father searches for evidence that would link Danny to Regina's murder.
episodes.title: Grief Is a Five-Letter Word

episodes.synopsis: Green Grove High School is putting on a skit for Sobriety Awareness Day. Jo volunteers to be a part of it, with disastrous consequences.
episodes.title: PSA De Resistance

episodes.synopsis: At Lacey's sleepover, Jo discovers something that sheds light on a possible new piece of evidence linked to Regina's murder.
episodes.title: Sleeping with the Frenemy

episodes.synopsis: The residents of Green Grove are upset when Danny goes to the Annual Fall Festival, leading to an embarrassing public confrontation.
episodes.title: The Fest and the Furious

episodes.synopsis: Danny, Jo and Lacey go on a road trip to follow a clue as to who might have sent the envelope to Regina.
episodes.title: Three for the Road

episodes.synopsis: Jo and Lacey figure out a way to tell Danny that his father is living at the apartment where Regina's envelope full of cash came from.
episodes.title: We Need to Talk About Danny

episodes.synopsis: Danny throws a party and Tyler agrees to help if he can film it for a documentary. Kyle confronts Karen about the necklace she threw into the river.
episodes.title: Docu-Trauma

episodes.synopsis: Karen sticks to her confession, despite what it could mean for her and Danny's future. Lacey's dad returns.
episodes.title: The Truth Will Out

episodes.synopsis: Accusations against Danny could get him kicked out of school, and Jo is upset when a video is released.
episodes.title: Poison of Interest

episodes.synopsis: Jo is still hurt over the video, and Lacey has become an outcast at school.
episodes.title: Out with the In-Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Danny seeks help from Jo as he goes on the run from the authorities. Danny tells Jo and Lacey the truth about what happened to Tara.
episodes.title: Dead Men Tell Big Tales

episodes.synopsis: As Charlie becomes interested in Lacey, she pursues a connection between Vikram and Gloria. Danny struggles with new information about his father.
episodes.title: Sins of the Father

episodes.synopsis: Tension mounts between Danny and Lacey as the homecoming dance approaches. Jo tries to facilitate a love connection between Andie and Rico.
episodes.title: Home Is Where the Hurt Is

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Jo discover a huge cover-up and wonder if they are in danger. Danny invites further attention in town when he acquires a large sum of cash.
episodes.title: Danny Indemnity

episodes.synopsis: As Jo decides to run for student body president, Jack's daughter returns from boarding school and befriends Lacey.
episodes.title: The Son Also Falls

episodes.synopsis: Danny's growing concerned with the relationship between Jo and Charlie. Whitney's a bad influence on Lacey. Kyle is suspicious about Jack and Vikram.
episodes.title: You're a Good Man, Charlie McBride

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Karen try to figure out how to help Jack. Tess shares a secret, then gets shocking news about her child.
episodes.title: Danny, Interrupted

episodes.synopsis: Jo goes to extreme lengths to protect Danny, further straining her relationship with Charlie. More of Vikram's secrets are unearthed.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Confessions
